name: Solar Surfer (Lebuh)
description:
Movement - WASD/Arrows

A - Space, Z, J, Alt

B - Esc, X, K

Start - Enter, Tab

Select - Shift, \

NOTE TO GAMEPAD USERS: This game uses a standard Nintendo layout (A is the *Right* face button and B is the bottom). Gamepad will work as standard past that.

Solar Surfer is a space exploration RPG that focuses on different game mechanics as well as an interactive story. You take control of the solar surfer, a traveler of the stars sailing through the universe, sent on quest to change the universe for the better.  With unique planets to travel to, you'll always have something to do!

- 10+ different planets to explore

- a unique battle system where strategy is key

- An interactive story where your choices matter

- New Game+ for added enjoyment

- Over 20 different bosses to defeat

In this demo version:

- Six planets to visit, one to complete

- Two different bosses to fight

- First act of the story

- One stick sword

https://discord.gg/725tbcX24f Join here for more updates and to ask any questions directly
